TEXT.TITLE: NVHOMES <NVH> SETS TWO-FOR-ONE SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: NVHomes LP said its board declared a two-for-one split of Class A units, payable to shareholders of record on April 20. It said certificates will be distributed about two weeks after the record date. Reuter
